mapper.update: update config set servicePhone=#{servicePhone}, serviceQQ=#{serviceQQ}, serviceWx=#{serviceWx}, bank1ImgUrl=#{bank1ImgUrl}, bank1GotoUrl=#{bank1GotoUrl}, bank2ImgUrl=#{bank2ImgUrl}, bank2GotoUrl=#{bank2GotoUrl}, moreBankUrl=#{moreBankUrl}, startPingang=#{startPingang}, alipay_mode=#{alipay_mode}, check_version=#{check_version}, android_check_version=#{android_check_version}, android_mode=#{android_mode}
